revised_title: Experimental Investigations on the Strength of Tubular Struts
tldr: This article presents experimental investigations on the strength of tubular struts, focusing on the different types of failure and the factors affecting their collapsing load. The author discusses various mathematical and experimental studies, highlighting the importance of stress-strain diagrams and the impact of material properties on strut behavior. The findings provide insights into the design and analysis of tubular structures in engineering applications.
